subject: Football
Espionage
lead_paragraph: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell is seeking a sweeping crackdown on spying for next season, according to a memo sent to the league’s rule-making competition committee.
snippet: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell is seeking a sweeping crackdown on spying for next season, according to a memo sent to the league’s rule-making competition committee.
